A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson and Disney destroyed the legacy of the Star Wars saga. This was overtly intentional as TLJ plot was clearly a metaphor for that destruction and their desire to start anew.  Star Wars survived on its great story\, even if the cinematography and acting wasn't always too-notch. This film reversed that trend by having good acting\, excellent cinematography\, but a convoluted\, directionless\, and non-sensical story.  This film was a terrible mistake.
